prompts.title: Engaging WhatsApp Greetings
prompts.description: This prompt helps create friendly and professional greeting messages for Indian retail shops on WhatsApp.
prompts.prompt_text: You are helping a small retail shop in India manage their WhatsApp marketing. Create a warm, welcoming message to greet customers via WhatsApp. It should be in English, professional yet approachable, and include [store name] along with an emoji or two at the end for visual appeal.
prompts.use_case: Use this prompt when creating customer engagement on your shop's WhatsApp business page.

prompts.title: Product Recommendation Bundle
prompts.description: This prompt assists in crafting targeted product recommendations and special offers suitable for Indian retail shops via WhatsApp chat.
prompts.prompt_text: You are an expert in WhatsApp marketing for Indian retail businesses. Suggest 3 short, practical tips to promote [product name] at a local Indian shop using WhatsApp with professional yet friendly tone.
prompts.use_case: Ideal for promoting seasonal sales or new arrivals without overwhelming customers.

prompts.title: Order Tracking System Prompt
prompts.description: This prompt generates templates for tracking customer orders efficiently via WhatsApp, helping Indian SMB owners manage deliveries professionally.
prompts.prompt_text: Create a simple order tracking system using AI prompts where I provide the order details and you respond with an automated WhatsApp message to update customers about their order status. Example: "Order #1234 from [store name] is now out for delivery! Estimated wait time 30 minutes."
prompts.use_case: Use this prompt when implementing a customer service chatbot or AI assistant specifically for handling order inquiries on WhatsApp.

packaging.product_name: WhatsApp Marketing Magic for Indian Retailers
packaging.description: Revolutionize your shop's growth with our expert AI prompt bundle designed specifically for Indian retail shops. These simple, actionable prompts help you engage customers and boost sales via WhatsApp without needing technical skills.
